description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Introducing Butterfly, Mr Twiggles, Barnabus Bumble and friends, here to keep your children entertained for hours. Catch the butterflies and witness the joy as all their friends join in the fun. A game so easy to play and yet so much fun even grandma will want to play.
description.short: Introducing Butterfly, Mr Twiggles, Barnabus Bumble and friends, here to keep your children entertained for hours. Catch the butterflies and witness the joy as all their friends join in the fun. A game so easy to play and yet so much fun even grandma will want to play.
